pageContext.claim: “And if you look at the one survey, the only bad survey [of hydroxychloroquine], they were giving it to people that were in very bad shape. They were very old, almost dead.”
pageContext.analysis: There was nothing unscientific about the retrospective analysis conducted by the U.S. Veterans Health Administration, which found increased mortality was observed in patients treated with hydroxychloroquine. Trump just did not like the conclusion, which echoed other reports on the drug he had touted. Several studies have questioned the effectiveness of hydroxychloroquine’s use in covid-19 patients. Some  found a higher risk of death in covid-19 patients who were given hydroxychloroquine.
